Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct after SLAY screening and prediction
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.29307492] Gram-negative bacteria:E. coli W3110 (MBC = 32 μM), Acinetobacter baumannii 5075 (MBC = 64 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa 14 (MBC = 32 μM), E. coli conferring New Delhi metallo-beta-lactamase (MBC = 64 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.29307492] The peptide showed 0.6% hemolysis against human red blood cells at 50 μM. PBS was uesd as a negative control and 1% triton was used as a positive control for 100% lysis.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented

Literature.Title: Discovery of Next-Generation Antimicrobials through Bacterial Self-Screening of Surface-Displayed Peptide Libraries
Literature.Author: Ashley T Tucker, Sean P Leonard, Cory D DuBois, Gregory A Knauf, Ashley L Cunningham, Claus O Wilke, M Stephen Trent, Bryan W Davies
